programme.desc: The return of Porkkala and the presidential election are quickly approaching; Helena help Sergeyev and his children defect to the West.

programme.title: Shadow Lines
programme.desc: CIA agent Lisa is desperate for Fagerholm's victory, but the Fist are on their guard; a struggle is being fought in the corridors of Parliament House.

programme.title: Shadow Lines
programme.desc: While the Cold War rages in Helsinki, Tabe Slioor lends a helping hand to New York-based Helena Korhonen amid a precarious situation that could have consumed the latter.

programme.title: Shadow Lines
programme.desc: Some suspicious activity takes place in Porkkala Naval Base, a place occupied by the Soviet Union. Meanwhile, Helena's mind is abuzz with questions about her past.

programme.title: Shadow Lines
programme.desc: The U.S. Embassy is conducting an investigation into the death of their CIA agent; Helena stands up against her godfather.

programme.title: Ghostwatch
programme.desc: A camera crew investigates the most haunted house in Britain.

programme.title: Nightwatch
programme.desc: The night watchman at a hospital morgue is haunted by grisly visions and deviant desires. When several local prostitutes are brutally murdered he becomes the primary suspect.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Demons Are Forever
programme.desc: Martin's daughter, Emma, takes up a night watch job to figure out what happened to her parents almost thirty years ago; a meeting with Wörmer in his cell pulls the serial killer out of his coma and sets in motion a chain of fateful events.

programme.title: Caveat
programme.desc: A desperate drifter suffering from partial memory loss agrees to look after his landlord's psychologically troubled niece in an isolated island mansion.

programme.title: Donnie Darko
programme.desc: An unusual teenager (Jake Gyllenhaal) follows the instructions of the 6-foot-tall rabbit which saved his life.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: John Carpenter's chiller about an escaped maniac who returns to his Illinois hometown to continue his bloody rampage.

programme.title: Watcher
programme.desc: As a serial killer stalks the city, a young actress who just moved to town with her boyfriend notices a mysterious stranger watching her from across the street.

programme.title: Christmas Presence
programme.desc: A Christmas gathering between friends quickly becomes a violent fight for survival.

programme.title: Christmas Bloody Christmas
programme.desc: Tori just wants to get drunk and party on Christmas Eve, but she's forced into a battle for survival when a robotic Santa Claus at a nearby toy store begins a killing spree in her small town.

programme.title: The Last Drive-In With Joe Bob Briggs
programme.desc: Joe Bob Briggs offers up an eclectic pairing of films, from horror classics to cult favorites.

programme.title: The Last Drive-In With Joe Bob Briggs
programme.desc: Joe Bob Briggs offers up an eclectic pairing of films, from horror classics to cult favorites.

programme.title: The Last Drive-In With Joe Bob Briggs

programme.title: The Last Drive-In With Joe Bob Briggs
programme.desc: Joe Bob Briggs offers up an eclectic pairing of films, from horror classics to cult favorites.

programme.title: Cursed Films
programme.desc: The release of "The Exorcist" is surrounded by controversy, as reports of fainting theater-goers and mysterious on-set accidents raise questions as to whether or not the film itself is evil.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: Home is where the heart is, unless one lives in a house of hell; whether they're filled with specters or psychos, every house of hell pokes at illusions of comfort and safety.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: The history of monster movies is also the history of the evolution of special effects technology; whatever their size or shape and whatever they represent, for many horror fans monsters are the best part of the genre.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: Sometimes disgusting, body horror films make audience members question their prejudices against physical difference, their attitudes about sex and gender, their fear of disease and contamination, and how much appearance determines destiny.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: The witch is a towering figure in the history of horror; the archetypical evil witch is everything mainstream religion tells believers a woman should not be -- and that unapologetic, very female power frightens men and fascinates women.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: Parents are supposed to love their children, no matter how awful their kids may be; the films highlighted in this episode may not solve the mystery of where evil comes from, but they have a terrifically terrifying time raising the question.

programme.title: Eli Roth's History of Horror
programme.desc: A deep dive into nine films that defy categorization and push the boundaries of horror; great films that entertain and provoke audiences; films that put society under a microscope, making people question not just what they fear, but why they fear it.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Diana learns the tragic circumstances surrounding why she was spellbound as a child; Diana's devastation at having lived her life as only half herself is interrupted by the Madison house releasing one of the missing pages from Ashmole 782.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's attempt to rescue Diana from Juliette goes horribly wrong; Diana discovers just how lethal her powers can be; as Matthew is dying, Diana must strike a dreadful bargain with the goddess and make the ultimate sacrificial pact.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: In Oxford's library, American historian and reluctant witch Diana Bishop unwittingly calls up an ancient magical manuscript, and finds herself confronted by geneticist and vampire Matthew Clairmont, who is determined to get his hands on the book.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Blind to the interest she has stirred amongst creatures, Diana fights an increasing pull towards the magical and turns her back on her witch heritage; matters take an unexpectedly dark turn when Satu is sent by Peter Knox to intimidate her.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Domenico takes Satu's information to menacing vampire Gerbert, who gains the advantage he has been waiting for; Diana refuses to help Knox realize his longing to destroy the vampires and answers his threats with a force of untamed elemental power.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's hope of keeping Diana safe is short-lived as Ysabeau refuses to welcome the warmblood; Knox calls an emergency meeting of the Congregation to denounce Matthew; Matthew's ferocious brother, Baldwin, plays a careful game to maintain control.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Gillian pays a price for her disloyalty to Diana; the vampires study witch DNA; the fall-out threatens the fragile equilibrium between creatures and the focus is on ending Matthew and Diana's relationship, whatever the cost.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Satu brutally tortures Diana in Gerbert's isolated castle ruins; Matthew, now sworn to hunt down and kill anyone who tries to harm Diana, attempts a daring airborne rescue mission with Baldwin in tow.
